title: It’s hard to negotiate with a gun to your head, warns ex-RBI governor Raghuram Rajan on Trump's tariffs
summary: Former RBI Governor Raghuram Rajan criticized the US’s 50% tariff on Indian exports, calling it a “gun to your head” tactic that hurts trade talks. While India could reduce Russian oil imports, political pressures complicate the issue.
fullContent: Former RBI Governor Raghuram Rajan criticized the US’s 50% tariff on Indian exports, calling it a “gun to your head” tactic that hurts trade talks. While India could reduce Russian oil imports, political pressures complicate the issue. Rajan doubts BRICS can mount a joint tariff response and warns that escalating tariffs risk damaging US-India relations and strategic partnership.

fullContent: Regaal Resources' Rs 306 crore IPO witnessed full subscription within hours, driven by strong investor demand reflected in a 21% grey market premium. The IPO, featuring a fresh issue and OFS, saw robust retail and non-institutional participation. Proceeds will be used to repay debt and for general corporate purposes, with brokerages recommending a 'Subscribe' rating for the long term.

Rupee may fall below 90 against dollar this year amid outflows, tariff risks
summary: Absent a meaningful improvement in capital flows, a sharper fall in oil prices, or decisive policy moves, the consensus and model-based forecasts indicate the rupee will most likely trade in the high-Rs 80s to around Rs 90 by year-end, with downside stress scenarios capable of...
fullContent: Absent a meaningful improvement in capital flows, a sharper fall in oil prices, or decisive policy moves, the consensus and model-based forecasts indicate the rupee will most likely trade in the high-Rs 80s to around Rs 90 by year-end, with downside stress scenarios capable of pushing levels into the low-90s.

title: Reliance AGM may offer Jio IPO timeline, retail outlook: Neeraj Dewan
summary: Neeraj Dewan shares insights on the fertilizer sector, anticipating positive movement due to good monsoons and consolidation. He notes a slowdown in Astral's performance and the housing space, awaiting a festive season sales boost. All eyes are on RCF's fundraising plans.
fullContent: Neeraj Dewan shares insights on the fertilizer sector, anticipating positive movement due to good monsoons and consolidation. He notes a slowdown in Astral's performance and the housing space, awaiting a festive season sales boost. All eyes are on RCF's fundraising plans. The market anticipates updates on Jio IPO and Reliance Retail's growth strategy at the upcoming AGM.

title: India Bonds Set to Extend Losses on Worries of Larger Supply
summary: Indian bonds dropped to a four-month low, as analysts warned of further losses amid concerns that the government may increase borrowing to fund a potential fiscal stimulus in response to steep US tariffs.
